POIR08.title: The Incredible Theft
POIR08.description: A wealthy industrialist's plan to snare a Nazi sympathizer goes awry when the secret plans for a new fighter plane inexplicably go missing.

ULTR39.title: Farewell, Ultraman
ULTR39.description: An alien invasion fleet arrives at Earth. While the Science Patrol deals with an infiltrator, Ultraman must confront the alien leader.

LITB096.title: Beaver's Library Book
LITB096.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 096 Beaver's Library Book.m4v
LITB096.description: Eddie Haskell convinces Beaver that the "library police" will soon come to arrest Ward after Beaver ignores the late notices for a lost library book he checked out with his father's library card.

TOTW1934.path: ../1930's Classics/Triumph Of The Will (Triumph Des Willens, 1934).mp4
TOTW1934.title: Triumph of the Will
TOTW1934.description: "Triumph des Willens" is a Nazi propaganda film directed, produced, edited and co-written by Leni Riefenstahl. It chronicles the 1934 Nazi Party Congress in Nuremberg, which was attended by more than 700,000 Nazi supporters.

LISP13.title: One of Our Dogs is Missing
LISP13.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 13 One of Our Dogs Is Missing.m4v
LISP13.description: With the men off on a mission, the Robinson women must deal with an alien intruder.

LITB097.title: Wally's Election
LITB097.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 097 Wally's Election.m4v
LITB097.description: After Eddie Haskell nominates a reluctant Wally to run for sophomore class president against Lumpy Rutherford, fathers Ward and Fred try to fulfill their own ambitions through their teenage sons.

SOKO20.title: Beware the Radion Globe
SOKO20.description: The Radion, close relative of the Nucleon, captures Giant Robot and Fangor is going to replace the robot's electronic brain.

LISP15.title: Return from Outer Space
LISP15.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 15 Return from Outer Space.m4v
LISP15.description: Using a matter transfer device left behind by the Taurons, Will beams himself back to Earth. He arrives safely in the small town of Hatfield Four Corners, Vermont, but his pleas for help are considered the fantasies of a runaway boy.

LITB098.title: Beaver and Andy
LITB098.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 098 Beaver and Andy.m4v
LITB098.description: A middle-aged man named Andy stops by the Cleavers seeking work as a handyman. Ward agrees to hire his friend, despite June's concerns that Andy is an alcoholic and may influence Wally and Beaver.

LITB100.title: Larry's Club
LITB100.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 100 Larry's Club.m4v
LITB100.description: Beaver regrets joining the secret "Bloody Fives" club without his friend Larry when he finds out that Larry has joined an even more secret club, "The Fiends".

LITB099.title: Beaver's Dance
LITB099.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 099 Beaver's Dance.m4v
LITB099.description: Beaver and Larry are forced to attend a series of high-class dances. After the first one, they decide to ditch them. Then they meet a young cowgirl and ride a horse.

SPRA39.title: The Secret Invaders (part 2)
SPRA39.description: Speed Racer fakes his death to draw out Elegantor and his assassins.

LISP14.title: Attack of the Monster Plants
LISP14.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 14 Attack of the Monster Plants.m4v
LISP14.description: Banished from camp for his latest endangering behavior, Dr. Smith discovers alien plants that can duplicate things (including people), which he uses to his advantage.

CSMS10.title: The Edge of Forever
CSMS10.description: Carl Sagan focuses on the origin of the universe by discussing the Big Bang, Galaxies, Dimensions, and the expansion of the universe.

SPRA40.title: The Man Behind the Mask
SPRA40.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 40 The Man Behind the Mask.mp4
SPRA40.description: A masked maniac takes the Mach 5 team hostage and forces Speed to carry out art gallery robberies.

LISP16.title: The Keeper (Part 1)
LISP16.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 16 The Keeper (Part 1).m4v
LISP16.description: The Keeper is an alien who travels the galaxy collecting living pairs of interesting or rare animals. His courtly overtures towards the Robinsons belie his true intention â€” to add a pair of humans to his incredible menagerie.

STAN20.title: Albatross
STAN20.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 20 Albatross.m4v
STAN20.description: Dr. McCoy is arrested and charged with causing an alien plague.

BSG121.title: The Hand of God
BSG121.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 22 - The Hand of God.m4v
BSG121.description: When the Galactica crew detects that a Cylon Basestar has swung around to attempt to intercept the refugee fleet, Commander Adama decides to attack.
